resources.string: Aptitude is inborn potential to do certain kinds of work. Brush it up!
Knowing how to put together a strong answer to the most common interview questions is obviously key to landing a job.
Video tutorials of all topics from top Youtube channels.

string-array.name: mechanical_books
string-array.item: Mechanics of material by Beer and Johnson
Strength of materials by Sadhu Singh

Design of machine elements by V.B Bhandari
Theory of machines by S. Ratan
Theory of mechanism and machines by Amitabh Ghosh and Asok Kumar
Fluid mechanics by K. L Kumar

Advanced Engineering Mathematics by Erwin Kreyszig
Industrial engineering and management by O.P Khanna
Operation research: Quantitative techniques for management by V.K Kapoor
Manufacturing science by Ghosh and Mallik
Mechanics for engineers (statics and dynamics) by Beer and Johnson
Engineering Mechanics: Statics And Dynamics by N. H. Dubey

Data and Computer Communications (William Stallings Books on Computer and Data Communications)
